Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class LeaderCardBlueprint

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.LeaderCardBlueprint
public class LeaderCardBlueprint
extends java.lang.Object
Class LeaderCardBlueprint is an auxiliary class used to build a leader card from the json files.

  • Constructor Details

    • LeaderCardBlueprint

      public LeaderCardBlueprint​(java.lang.String type, boolean hasResourceRequirements, int victoryPoints, int[] resourceRequirements, int firstCardLevel, int secondCardLevel, int thirdCardLevel, java.lang.String firstCardColour, java.lang.String secondCardColour, java.lang.String thirdCardColour, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String url)
      Default constructor. Parameters are retrieved from the json file.
      Parameters:
      type - the leader type of the card
      hasResourceRequirements - true if the card has resource requirements, false otherwise
      victoryPoints - the amount of victory points granted by the card
      resourceRequirements - the array of resource requirements of the card
      firstCardLevel - the level of the first required card
      secondCardLevel - the level of the second required card
      thirdCardLevel - the level of the third required card
      firstCardColour - the colour of the first required card
      secondCardColour - the colour of the second required card
      thirdCardColour - the colour of the third required card
      resource - the resource associated with the card
      url - the url of the image corresponding to the card

  • Method Details

    • BuildCard

      public LeaderCard BuildCard()
      Creates a new leader card object. Note that if the card does not have card requirements, the level of these required cards is set to -1 in the json file. If the card has card requirements but the level is not specified, the level of these required cards is set to 0 in the json file.
      Returns:
      the created leader card

    • BuildResources

      private void BuildResources​(java.util.List<ResourceQuantity> resourceList, int[] array)
      Fills the list of resources using the information contained in the arrays retrieved from the json file.
      Parameters:
      resourceList - the empty list of resource to fill
      array - the array that contains information about the resources
